name: Proto Investment Partners
tag_list: angel, early-stage-venture-capital, australia, startups, angels, angel-investor, sidecar-fund, australia-sidecar-fund, sydney-angels, sydney-sidecar-fund, sydney-angel-sidecar-fund, australian-angel, australian-angel-sidecar-fund, tax-free
overview:
Proto Investment Partners is a highly specialized alternative investment manager, with offices in Sydney and Melbourne, focused on Australian angel investments and early stage venture capital.

Its first fund, the Sydney Angels Sidecar Fund provides investors with access to a unique flow of early stage (angel) business investments sourced, screened and selected by Sydney Angels.

The Fund is structured as a limited partnership and has conditional ESVCLP registration with Innovation Australia. The ESVCLP program is a federal government initiative designed to stimulate investment into Australiaâ€™s early stage venture capital sector by allowing generous tax concessions to investors in funds that meet the registration and investment criteria set out in the Venture Capital Act 2002 (Cth). For investors, income and capital gains received from an investment in the Fund will be tax exempt.

milestones.description: Proto Investment Partners announce completion of $10 million capital raising for Sydney Angels Sidecar Fund.
Proto Investment Partners and the Sydney Angels Sidecar Fund welcomes Venture Capital firm MH Carnegie & Co as an investor in the fund and as a partner targeting larger co-investments.
